Q79: Since I am a new faculty member, I do not currently have funded research projects underway. Q38_1_TEXT: Preventing Obesity by Design
Q38_4_TEXT: Nilda Cosco, PhD; co-PI, Robin Moore, MCP
Q38_7_TEXT: BCBS of North Carolina Foundation, John Rex Endowment, Kate B. Reynolds Foundation
Q79: Main thrust of Natural Learning Initiative (NLI) in this area is healthy eating in early childhood through hands-on gardening and exposure to edible landscapes in childcare centers and other institutions such as children's museums, botanical gardens, etc. Preventing Obesity by Design, includes multiple, statewide professional development and training components (symposia, design workshops, webinars) targeting both policymakers and frontline program professionals. NLI also offers an annual Growing IN Place Symposium (Spring) and Design Institute (Fall), both of which include food/nutrition/sustainable gardening/permaculture/community gardening components addressed by local and national presenters.
